title: I-95
meaning: The start of this musical journey. Replace the highway, and make the trip a little longer, and this song tells the story of the distance I would travel (and have traveled) to be able to see you.
lyrics:
They sell posters of girls washing cars
Unicorns and stars
Guns and roses album covers
They got most of the Barney DVDs
Coffee mugs and tees
That say Virginia is for lovers
But its not
Round here its just for truckers who forgot
To fill up on gasoline
Back up near Aberdeen

It’s a nine hour drive
From me to you
South on I-95
And I’ll do it till the day that I die
If I need to
Just to see you
Just to see you

Hip hop stations are fading in and out
All I’m receiving now
Is a kick drum mixed with static
Constellations are blinking in the sky
The road is open wide and it feels so cinematic
Till a van driven by an elder gentleman
Cuts right in front of me
From then on thats all I see

It’s a nine hour drive from me to you
South on I-95
And I’ll do it till the the day that I die
If I need to
Just to see you
Just to see you
favoriteLyrics:
It's a nine hour drive, from me to you
South on I-95 and I'll
Do it til the day that i die if I need to
Just to see you

title: Be My Baby
meaning: A classic song, performed by one of my favorite 'newer' artists. A simple song about wanting you to be mine.
favoriteLyrics:
For every kiss you give me
I'll give you three

title: Rhythm of Love
meaning: A bright, poppy song, much like you.
favoriteLyrics:
We may only have tonight
But till the morning sun you're mine, all mine
Play the music low and sway to the rhythm of love

title: She
meaning: This song has been in my consciousness for a while, and every time I hear it, it makes me think of you. It reflects the dichotomy of good days and bad, but through it all, how strongly she holds my love.
favoriteLyrics:
Me, I'll take her laughter and her tears
And make them all my souvenirs

title: My One and Only Love
meaning: Another cover version. This one from Sir Paul's album of old standards. I'm a sucker for older love songs (some of which did not make this list - maybe a future one?). The first time I heard this one, the passion just really grabbed me, especially my favorite lyric...
favoriteLyrics:
You fill my eager heart with such desire
Every kiss you give sets my soul on fire

title: All My Love
meaning: The newest song of the bunch. The moment I heard this song, I was hooked and it's been on a pretty consistent loop since. I guess regardless of the age of the song, I'm just a sucker for a love song. I first became aware of the song from the video below. And the pure joy of Dick Van Dyke makes me think of you.
lyrics:
We've been through low
Been through sunshine, been through snow
All the colors of the weather
We've been through high
Every corner of the sky
And still we're holding on together
You got all my love
Whether it rains or pours, I'm all yours
You've got all my love
Whether it rains, it remains
You've got all my love
Until I die
Let me hold you if you cry
Be my one, two, three, forever
'Cause you got all my love
Whether it rains or pours, I'm all yours
You've got all my love
Whether it rains, it remains
You've got all my love
La-la, la-la, la, lay
Whether it rains or pours, I'm all yours
La-la, la-la, la, lay
That's all, all I can say
Ooh, you got all my love
Oh, for now and always, 'til the end of my days
You got all my love
You've got all my love
favoriteLyrics:
And till I die
Let me hold you if you cry

title: The Book of Love
meaning: I first heard this song from the video below. I'm a sap, so seeing JD look into his future as this song played just tugged at my heart.
favoriteLyrics:
I love it when you sing to me
And you can sing me anything

title: If I Should Fall Behind
meaning: This song was a grower for me. It took some time for it to really hit me. A simple message of walking side by side, not letting each other get too far behind. It makes me think of us, strolling through a big city, hand in hand.
favoriteLyrics:
And if as we're walking a hand should slip free
Well, I will wait for you
And if I fall behind
Wait for me
